outline:
1. to set, make, appoint
    1. (P'al)
      1. to make, make decree, set out (decree)
      2. to make, appoint
      3. to set, fix
    2. (Ithp'al) to be made, be set, be laid
kjv_def: [phrase] command, give, lay, make, [phrase] name, [phrase] regard, set.
strongs_def: {to put (used in a great variety of applications, literal, figurative, inferentially, and elliptically)}
